person.persName: Joseph C. Bontecou (Hamilton County, Ohio, music teacher; lieut 2nd Ky Inf & 10th OH Lt Artil USA)

body.p: Hamilton County, Ohio, music teacher and soldier. Rhode Island native. Son of James Bontecou and Mary A. Bontecou. Professor of music in Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1860. Served in the 2nd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant from May 6, 1861, to August 6, 1863. Served in the 10th Ohio Light Artillery (U.S.A.) as second lieutenant from January 15, 1864, to July 17, 1865.
